word: G4972 - σφραγίζω - sphragízō - sfrag-id'-zo - Seal up

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - முத்திரை போடு, ஒப்புவி, முத்தரித்திரு, முத்திரையாகப் பெறு
1. to hide keep in silence, keep secret
2. in order to prove, confirm, or attest a thing; to confirm, authenticate, place beyond doubt

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4973; to stamp (with a signet or private mark) for security or preservation (literally or figuratively); by implication to keep secret, to attest: - (set a, set to) seal up, stop.
Cognate: G2696, G4972, G4973
